document_data.mainbody:
Whalebone Spiced was a type of spirit from the Whalebones isles, brought to Waterdeep by the citys many sailors. From there, it spread to the Western Heartlands, along the River Chionthar, and the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
This spiced alcohol was of amber color and sold in wide-bottomed and thin-necked bottles of green glass.
